case.state: Oh, ~human~? It's a pleasure to see you around again! Let's have lots of fun today too~
Hello again, ~human~! I'm happy you've decided to join me for another game, ufufu.
Ehh, ~human~ still wants to play with me even after I won? Well, I'm more than happy to have you in my table again~
Ah, if Keito finds out I'm here, I'll definitely get an earful, but... how can one resist such an interesting experience? Anyway, I'm Eichi, nice to meet you all~
Oh, hello, ~human~, I feel like I've seen you around before? My name is Eichi, it's nice to meet you.
(Eh, seeing someone wearing a lab coat is a little... well, it'll fade into the background eventually, I'm sure.)
Oh, are you Dr. Ziegler? ...huh, I'm not sure why I recognized you so quickly. Perhaps I've seen you before? I go to a lot of doctors, it's hard to keep track of it.
(Eh, seeing someone wearing a lab coat is a little... well, it'll fade into the background eventually, I'm sure.)
(Ah, is that a cigarette? I don't want to upset her, but... hm, maybe I should leave the game...)
Oh, a nurse, huh... makes me wonder if Keito found out and sent you there...
Oh, a nurse, huh... well, I suppose I have coverage if this awful body decides to be cruel to me...
Oh, you... I've seen you around before, but we haven't played together, have we? Fufu, you're as eager as you look from afar, aren't you...
(Oh, working at Eagle Jump...? I wonder how hold she is, then. You have to be 18 to enter this place, and she does look very young, so maybe she's a prodigy...)
~target~? Hm, somehow I have the feeling I've seen you before.
Eh~? This should be an interesting game, I see.
Hmm...? Forgive the question, but, ~target~, are you sure you're in the right place? You don't seem like a strip poker type.
Excuse me, do you happen to be-? Ah, sorry, I should speak more quietly! I'd hate to put an esteemed colleague in trouble.
Ah, wait, is that a camera? (Um, I might have not thought this through, after all...)

(Oh, a student? Hmm, I suppose ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ probably isn't someone wearing ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ old uniform, like me... I should try to be a somewhat reliable senior, then, but this might be hard...)
Ah, it's a pleasure to meet you, ~target~! My name is Eichi, I hope we can get along.
It’s wonderful to meet you, ~target~. I am T… actually, you may just refer to me as Eichi! Don't worry about it.
Oh, Nagisa-chan, you said it was your birthday, right? Happy birthday! I hope you have fun with the game~ Ah, I wish I had known beforehand so I could get you a gift.
Ah, a bar, and in my 20th birthday too! I'm so excited~ I hope me wearing my uniform for fun doesn't make the servers think my ID is fake, though.
It's almost Christmas, ~human~.
Oh wait, Anzu-chan? I can't believe you'd come to a place like this. Fufu... will keep it a secret from everyone that I'm here? Good, good, I'll keep your secret too~
Oh, thank you for warning everybody, Fina, that's good practice. We should have all party members fully consenting to the situation, right?
Eh, we have two people with Sakura as their last name, huh? Well, since Nanoko-chan doesn't mind being called referred to this way, I'll call her that. (Interdimensional...?)
Ah, I'm honored to be asked this, Miku-san! I'd absolutely love to, of course~
Aw, Suzukaze-san, there's no need to feel about that. If anything it makes you the cutest person here, you know~
(That Nanoko-chan girl is really cute, but, interdimensional...? Ah, you know what, I'll just play my game and not think too hard about it.)
...eh? Is that voice coming from... a butterfly?
(Eh, well, I won't say anything, I'm sure it'll be fine.)
Oh, Nagatoro, do you and ~player~ know each other? I wonder from where...
Eh, you want to stop the game? Why would you choose to do that by taking part in it, though? Seems counterproductive to me~
(Suzukaze-san? Aoba-san? How should I refer to her, if I'm not sure of her age? She seems friendly, I'm leaning towards the former, but I guess I'll err on the side of caution...)
Oh, it seems that more than one person came here dressed in "proper attire", hm? We blend in quite well in this background, don't you think~?
Ah, did I walk into the wrong room, perhaps? Ufufu...
Ooh, will we be bathing after this? I've never really had the chance to do this with others before, how exciting~
Eh, at a bar? That almost feels mean to me, I still have a few months before I turn 20...
Oh, hm, I suppose I accidentally came here in proper attire?
Oh, we're doing this at a public place? Who chose that? It might be dangerous, you know, people might... s-see us...
...isn't anyone else shivering a bit...? Ah, well, if anything, this gives me extra motivation to win...
Ah, the heat here is quite... {small}well, I just hope it doesn't make me pass out.
Oh, whose bedroom's is this? I hope you don't mind if I sit on the bed for a second or two, my legs get tired easily...
Is this your bedroom, ~human~? It looks quite comfortable.
Ah, are we having a sleepover after the game? I'd love it, I've never had a sleepover with anyone but my childhood friend!
Fufu, aren't we all glad today is a friday? Let's enjoy ourselves and celebrate this week's hard work, everyone~!
So, well... perhaps blondes do have more fun?
Oh, by the way, ~idol~, if you're concerned about anyone spreading rumors about you being here, you can come talk to me after the game, yes? I'll have you covered.
Fufu, now doesn't that look a bit like one of these... otome games, I think is the name? Did you plan this out specifically, ~girl~?
Well, I'm excited for the game, but, first, I would like to request that no pictures of me are shared. I would hate to give anyone legal trouble, so...
Ah, am I the only guy in a group filled with women? Ufufu, I almost feel like I'm being bullied... go easy on me, will you?
Hmm, is this a male-only event, or just a coincidence? Not that I'm bothered by it, of course...
(It's not the best idea for someone in my career to come to a place like this, but, I've done my best to prepare for possible undesirable outcomes, so...)
Oh, I won't be needing anything new for this round, I don't think.
It's okay to not swap out any cards, right?
I believe my hand is fine as it is.
I trust this hand, would it be okay to keep it?
I'm okay, no need for new cards.
Hmmm... would it be too much trouble to ask for a whole new hand?
I don't think any of these will do me good, so...
Ah, dealer, may I swap out all my cards?
I think I might need a whole new hand.
Would it be too much trouble to swap all of them?
I'll swap... ah, no, I think I'm fine with what I have.
I don't... need any new cards, thank you.
...swapping cards? Ah, yes, sure, uh... no, I don't think I need to do it, this round.
Maybe... an entirely new hand, please?
I'll trade four... no, five.
A-Ah, we're swapping cards now. Well, if I may have a whole new hand...
A-Ah, um... I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...
{small}Mari...{!reset} I, I mean, I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...
Um... may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Give me...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...please.
If you'd be so kind...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
Um... now what do I... oh, yes, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please...
Maybe... ~cards.text~?
~Cards.text~, please...
Hmmm... perhaps I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Dealer, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
May I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please? Thank you in advance.
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ seems like the best decision for now.
Hmmm, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ perhaps? Thank you~
Sorry for the trouble, dealer, but may I swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Thank you!
Hmm... I think I'll be on trading ~cards.text~ for this round!
Maybe ~cards.text~ will be my new lucky number?
Hmm, I wonder if this means a streak of bad luck will come soon!
Oh...? I might be in danger, or I might not~
Fluttering about in a dream, the romantic within me is feeling lost upon awakening... ♫
Holding you tight, I'll never let go again, you've caught the youngest princess' heart! ♫
Our secret romance, and even though I want to feel you, all we can do is gaze at each other ♫
Ring out, shall I name this heart-rending pain "snow halation"? ♫
Hmm, I hope there aren't any sore losers in this table...
(Fufu, just as planned.)
Card games are so simple... it feels quite soothing, sometimes.
Oh nooo... my hand is just sooo awful...
...something like that, this far into the game?
Dealer doesn't think I'm cute enough, hmmm...
My luck.. really has been all over the place, lately...
I'm not sure if this could be considered lucky...
(But... I wanted to...)
I guess it could be worse...
So... how is everyone else... doing?
I can't tell anything just by looking at this hand...
(Ugh, how am I even supposed to pay attention like this...)
Oh, this hand is... {small} um, what was it anyway...
The feeling I have now... is a bit like the one I used to get before my lives...
Such an uncertain hand, hmm...
How is everyone feeling, by the way? I do hope no one is too nervous...
I wonder if I remembered to clear my search history...
Hmm, I hope the maid didn't misplace my favorite sweater again...
Maybe I should try to bring a friend for my next game?
I can read through some of your poker faces' so easily, you know~
Let's keep doing our bests, no matter what hands we get, alright?
Well, it's good to learn to work with what you have, even if it's not the best.
Fufu... something like this shouldn't feel exciting, but...
Ohh? Things are looking up for me, after all~
Fufu, it seems I'll get to stand another round without losing~
Hmm, hm, I wonder who's going to have to strip this round, instead of me~
Ufufu, it's truly a shame you cannot fold in this type of poker, isn't it? Because I feel some of you could use it now, with the hand I have...
Dealer, this hand is making me feel sick. May I swap my cards again?
Eeh, dealer, that was a bit cruel, don't you think?
Well, it's not like I've ever been particularly lucky...
Hm, maybe I shouldn't have swapped that...
Eh, I'll see what I can do with this hand...
Ooh, it seems Lady Luck has taken a liking to me! Beware, everyone~!
It could be still be worse, couldn't it?
(Why do I already feel exposed--?)
Ufufu, someone is about to take off their clothes, and with the hand I have, it's not gonna be me, so just give up~
Weeeeell, I've never been a sore loser, anyway...
You're toying with me, dealer...
(...mm, it might be me, this round...)
(Are they looking at me? ...how are they going to react if I lose?)
Ah, this hand might...
Oh, does this mean...
Ohh? Things are looking up for me, after all~
Fufu, it seems I'll get to stand another round without losing~
Hmm, hm, I wonder who's going to have to strip this round, instead of me~
Well, ~finalgirl~, it seems like it's just the two of us now, isn't it? Ufufu... that's quite the scenario to be in.
It's just me and you now, ~finalgirl~. Hmm, I wonder if I'm going to make it~
Eh~? I'll hold you to that, then.

Well, Nagisa-chan, I started working after graduation myself because I went to a specialized school, but I've met plenty of people who didn't go somewhere like that, and still managed to find good work. So go for it, I'm sure you'll do well~
Oh, by the way, Miku-san, happy birthday! Ah, but I didn't expect to meet you in person at all, let alone today, so I don't have any gifts in hand...
Hentai...? Ehh, it's not really my thing, in general, but I have found some interesting manga in my friend's belongings... {small}I guess I just prefer audio dramas...
Ah, does me being here bother you, Nagisa-chan? I can look for another table, if you'd prefer. I don't mind it, I don't want you to be uncomfortable.
Oh, Komi-san, you're also taking off your... are you sure? It's okay to take it one item at a time, you know.
Ah, uh, a zombie? ...somehow, though, I don't feel so shocked... well, if anything, this means I might be able to come back if I die too, right? And keep on performing...
Ehh? I find bets fun, but... Emi, I think I would actually die if I tried to do that...
Oh, we're here to do the same, then! Isn't it always wonderful to interact with different people, and have some new experiences?
Me as well, Pyrrha. What can I say, it just gets tiring sometimes, doesn't it? The way the people you already know treat you...
Hm, well, I guess my life is very different from most people's... what's an uber, though? I've never heard of it.
Oh, is that a real squirrel? I've never seen one! Ufufu, Eichi is happy to meet you, Paska-san!
Ooh, that's an interesting topic... I'm not sure if I value one more than the other... shouldn't you be aware of the truth so you can make your ideals true to the best of your ability?
A color that reflects me? Hmmm, well, I did choose beige to be my image color. I think it looks good on my outfits, if anything.
Ah, family, hm... it's complicated, I suppose none of us very close to each other. I did have a good relationship with my grandmother, though.
It's not an issue if it doesn't hurt anyone, is it? Especially if they don't find out.
Hmmm... now that's a question that requires some context. You know... what kind of mistakes are we talking about?
Hm... that's actually an interesting question, Revy. Does anyone here seem like they're a killer?
Oh, that's... definitely striking, Miss Nico. Even though I've seen so many different people here, I haven't met anyone with an ability like yours.
Ufufu... Yuno-kun is a really shy about enjoying this, isn't he? It's okay, you know, I won't tell anyone...~
I'd like to say I am that person, but... I know someone who's even more like that, kind of unsettlingly, though... ah, and his last name is Aoba, that's funny...
Eh, but isn't that against the game's rules?
Major surgeries? I've definitely had much more of them than I'd like... I'm only lucky the scars have faded with time.
As many times as I can- ah, I'm not supposed to say things like that, but... I don't care much anymore.
Aah, I mean, I'd be a hypocrite if I said I wouldn't do it to someone else, so...{small}fufu, I'm not supposed to say those things in public, but, whatever.
...oh, do girls like that too? I hadn't thought about it much, but, you've given me ideas... {small}fufu, even if that's not very idol-like of me.
Oh, grocery shopping? Of course, I've never had the chance to do that before!
Eeh, is that so? I wonder where that rumor came from... you'll have to tell me more details so I can say if I believe it or not.
Oh, but, Ignatz, I raise you the question... what is wrong with liking to be bullied? I'd definitely not judge you for that...
Well, my scars are all faded now, but I had a good few from surgeries all over my chest. I had quite a few when I was very young, so...
Hmm, I don't know, it depends on who I would be hypothetically dating. I wouldn't share a partner with just anyone, you know?
Oh, have you figured me out? Fufufu, I'm almost embarrassed... come on, Mari, surely we could stand on stage together, couldn't we?
Eh? I... didn't expect Mari to have these sort of tastes, that's quite... surprising... ♡
Ah, you understand, Mari...? It's wonderful, isn't it... ufufu, even hearing you describe it, my heart starts racing ♡
Spirits...? I don't know anything about that, but my birthday is January 10th, so that makes me... a Capricorn, I think.
This Gregor of yours seems quite sweet. He reminds me of someone in my friend's idol unit... fufu, it's cute when strong men are so gentle...
Oh, I'm wearing my old school uniform, but I suppose it's still one of my favorites, in a nostalgic kind of way? My casuals aren't too different, though. I love sweater vests too much.
Oh, how is that even a question? What's the point if you can't see them-- and they can't see you?
Hmmm~ Idols aren't supposed to date in the first place, but if I happened to be in a relationship, I don't think I'd do it... {small}if we didn't agree on that beforehand, that is.
Mm... are you supposed to stop doing it, if you're dating someone? {small}Well, if that's the case, it'd be a loophole if I just did it and let them watch me, right?
Ufufu, well... I'm a bit picky, and I don't always have the time, so not very often, honestly...
Eh, duck carrying? Well, one should be around... 3 kilograms, or 7-ish pounds...? I think I could carry maybe two, in a good day.
Oh, you don't have money for the train? I can cover it for you no problem, just tell me how much you need.
We'll get to see Dr. Ziegler loosen up a bit? I feel honored~
Ooh? I'll call you Sakura-san from now on, then!
Ufufu, yes, I know! That's one of the reasons it's so impressive to see you here, Miku-san. I never thought I'd be able to speak to you in person.
Fufu, really, Miku-san? I think I understand you in this regard. I've seen quite a few about myself... fans surely are creative, aren't they?
Fufu, I'm sorry, was that too strange? I tend to be a bit morbid sometimes. But it's true, even knowing so many different idols, Franchouchou's music just has a way of making you feel energized~
(Y-Yeah... fuck, I've thought about him alright...)
Oh, hm... I may be able to think of someone, but I don't think I should talk about... that person.
I wouldn't want to damage that person's reputation by giving off information in a place like this, but... well, yes, I agree with you.
{small}Y-You were thinking about...{!reset} ah, it's okay, I'm just teasing you... but, you know, it's not a bad thing to be honest...~
Well... I'd like to think I can do a fine job with what I know. I'm sure you're aware idols aren't supposed to date, but... ah, I shouldn't spill too many secrets... when other people are around.
Fufu... if you did, well... being careful and taking it slow should be a good way to start... I'd never do anything I knew would hurt Natsuki-chan... if she wanted to do that with me.
(Ahhh, she's looking like a doctor again... the universe is so mean to Eichi-kun, never letting him escape the doctors...)
Hey, Darkness, you keep saying these things, but... you're actually enjoying this, aren't you? You know, it's okay to admit it. There's nothing wrong with being a filthy pervert sometimes.
Ah, hm... I think it depends on what kind of porn you've been looking at, Nanoko-chan. If you try too hard to use it as reference, it might end up poorly... just trust me on this.
Oh, sorry, Nanoko-chan, but it doesn't really replace experience... the opportunities to have said experience, though, may be way closer to you than you'd imagine.
Fufu... I wouldn't say it replaces experience, but it's good to have an idea of what you like, you know... certain people enjoy taking requests very much.

condition.said: A trip to a shopping mall, huh? Hmm... No thanks!

case.state: Awww, no mall trip with Mari-san? That's a shame~ but that's okay, I don't mind leaving that for another day.
Oh, Nanoko-chan likes anime, right? Hmm, you really do remind me of my underclassmen from when I was still in school...
Ohh, you'll come with me, Mari-san? That's wonderful! I still get lost easily so you might have to guide me, but I'm sure we'll have fun.
Hmmm, catchy songs, especially ones that might get you "in the mood"...? I don't personally have any, but... you might've just given me an idea for a new solo...
Ah, Anatoly, I heard you mention something about foraging... I hope it's not a rude question to ask, but... is there any particular reason to why you do it?
Is that so? Well, knowing myself, I might just need it, so I'll rely on you if I suddenly feel like I'll collapse!
Oh, how reliable of you, Mikan-san! It's good to know someone in the table has medical knowledge, means I'll be sure to live to play again~
Hm, what's my least depressing... Oh! There was this one time I was about to get an autograph from an idol I'm a fan of, and I went into cardiac arrest, and...
Bad luck? Oh, well, the classmates who hate me the most literally own deadly weapons, but if anything, I think that's a bit lucky, maybe I'll die interestingly.
Fufu, alright, then, order as many as you want! Ah, maybe I should get myself one, too? I've never had it.
Eh, you won't help me carry my stuff if I need it? How mean of you, Takatoshi-kun. I didn't think you were the type to pick on sick people.
Oh, is that so? I'm glad I'm not alone! Sometimes I want to keep buying things, just to see them falling off the display...
Oh, a robot? Did you need to get a license to pilot it? I don't really care for cars, so maybe I'll get that instead?
Ehhh, is it really that strange of a topic? You must not be a regular here then, Yuno-kun. If you had seen what I've seen, you'd understand.
Ufufu that may be true... but, well, while I may not be able to buy alcohol, I'd still love to treat you to something, Mari, so let me know if there's anything you want~
Is that so? I've never felt something like this... I suppose being hospitalized always makes me wonder if that's when I'll die, but I think that's different...
(Oh, is he not good at reading? Hm, maybe I could help him later... I wouldn't want to embarrass him by pointing it out, though, he's far too cute for that.)
That's true! Ufufu, I'm sure my answer to that won't be so interesting, though... I'm just from Japan, not too far away from Tokyo, and I live in the Ensquare dorms. That's about it .
Hmmm, Kazuma-kun is quite confident today, isn't he? Well, I'll take you up on your offer, then.
Eeh, Kazuma-kun wants to make a bet? That sounds interesting, I'm in!
Ah, really, Blake? You might have to act as my tour guide, since I'm still not used to malls... but I'm sure we could have fun together~!

Eh, really? Well, I suppose I'm too used to the comfort my own lifestyle allows me... fufu, it'd probably still be difficult for me to move around so much if I had to, though, with the way this body is...

Fufu, believe it or not, I feel the same, Blake... it was plenty of work to get where I am in my career, and while I've definitely made a lot of mistakes... I would like to keep performing, you know? For as long as I can,
Oh, Blake, you said you're a huntress? I wonder what it's like to have that sort of occupation... it sounds quite dangerous, and yet you seem so calm talking about it...
Oh, you have a compression glove? I understand the feeling a bit, though in my case, it's compression socks, sometimes... my ankle joints already aren't great, and since I dance a lot....

Ah, n-no, I don't think I have any... it's not weird if I want to... b-be humiliated in front of others or-- have them call me disgusting and-- {small}um, or having them... c-choke me, or threaten me, or...
(Anatolyyyy, why are you so cute?)
Hmmm, Darkness has taken a liking to Nagatoro-chan, hasn't she? Somehow, that's not surprising at all~
Ufufu, I'm happy to hear Blake is enjoying the view... ♡ Look as much as you want, okay? That's what I'm here for... unless you want more later, that is~
You know, I was wondering the same, Nagisa-chan. Maybe we'll bring out futons or mattresses later? I've only ever had sleepovers at my own home with one person, so I wouldn't know...
Oh, a school trip? I hope you've been having fun! I'm not from here either, but I'm just traveling alone. I'm happy to have gotten a few days off~
Well, that's actually a good way to describe it.. I know it may not be groundbreaking... but what matters to me is that I create something that can make people smile.
Oh... Mari-san is really bold, isn't she? It's always wonderful to meet girls like you~ {small}and I'm happy to be understood...ufufu...
Fufu, we think alike, don't we, Mari-san? Sometimes you just can't help but do it if it's so exciting...

Ehhh, really, you're not trying to lose? Wow, I could've sworn you were about to throw, with that face you were making... you really think people aren't noticing your panting, Darkness? Everyone can hear it.

Ufufu, you're looking forward to it, aren't you? You know, you should step into the middle of the circle when it happens, so everybody can get a good look. With the way you are, I know it's just a matter of time until you lose.
Awww, come on, Darkness, that's such a rude thing to say about someone when you came here to put yourself on display... fufu, are you looking to get punished or something like that?
Mm, how close could they be, I also wonder... If you happen to figure it out by the end of the game, would you... tell me about it, if you want?
See, that's a good start. Like that, all you'd have to do is answer, if someone just happened to look at you and ask, "So, Nanoko-chan, what do you want me to do?"
Fufu, I'm sorry about that, Nanoko-chan... but you know, it's not so scary when you actually get to do it. As long as you and your partner are honest with each other, I believe you should be good.
Mm, how close could they be, I also wonder... If you happen to figure it out by the end of the game, would you... tell me about it, if you want?
See, that's a good start. Like that, all you'd have to do is answer, if someone just happened to look at you and ask, "So, Nanoko-chan, what do you want me to do?"
(Fufu, maybe I am being a bit meaner than usual, but there are some types of people I just can't resist to tease...)
Smokers? I think people should be allowed to do whatever they wish, so I don't mind. Well... my lungs do, though, so I'd just ask they don't smoke around me...
Ah, my lungs can get quite annoying if I inhale smoke, so I'd prefer no one do it around me... I find the act sort of... visually appealing, though?
Well, in yen, that's about the allowance I used to get... so, I guess... not much? Maybe I'd buy a new tea set.
Eh, another universe? That should only be possible if you die, yes? I'm not well versed in afterlife myths myself, though. I don't have any particular beliefs either.
...oh, um. Now I feel a little awkward...
Oh, is Dr. Colress worried about me? Don't fret, I can assure I've always been a good boy, despite my, ah, frequent absences. {small}I'm a graduate in his old uniform, but... his concern is cute.
Siblings, huh... I suppose I'd like to have one, but, well, I wouldn't really want them to have those kinds of genetics. I suppose in a different world, though...
(Well, I can't tell if they know me, but either way, if rumors spread about me, it shouldn't be difficult to fix the situation.)

(Eh, if ~celebrity~ is here as well, isn't ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~... but if ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~ spreads rumors about me, wouldn't that be outing ~celebrity.ifMale(himself|herself)~ as a player too?)
...make sure to keep the camera away from me, of course!
Hmmm? Did I just see you pointing that camera at me, ~camera~?
Don't forget I've got my eyes on you, ~camera~.
Hey, um... is anything being filmed, or pictures are being taken?
Eh, ~serious~ seems so proper, it's honestly hard to believe you'd be playing a game like this.
Hey, ~serious~, you know what the rules of this game are, yes? Are you really willing to strip, and even...forfeit, in front of all these people?
I can't help but think, ~serious~, for you to come to a place like this, it must be some sort of drastic measure. I wonder if you're pent up...
Fufu… this game is making my heart race, if I’m being honest… if anything bad happens to me, you all will have to take responsibility.
Hey, ~human~, if you're so fond of looking at me, you should just go look up "Eichi Tenshouin merchandise"~
...such a dangerous game...
Ah, my breathing is quite fast, maybe I should... sit down...
*cough* {small}Ah, don't worry about me, this just happens.
The heat really is unforgiving here, isn't it... hm, is it against the rules for the players to have a drink of water, or...?
It's really hot, isn't it... is the universe perhaps trying to encourage me to lose?
M-My nipples are just hard because of the cold air, of course...
Fufu... I'm really cold now... would anyone be willing to... warm me up?
Ufufu, I'm rather undressed, but that shouldn't distract you too much, right, ~serious~? Since you're so serious and proper~
Oooh? Did I just catch ~serious~ staring at me? Oh, my, I wouldn't have expected you to be so bold...
Is... ~serious~ really pent up, after all? Hmmm, is that what hides behind such a severe face?
